options(knitr.table.format = "latex")
library(kableExtra)

kable(dt, longtable=TRUE, 
      caption = paste0("List of published trait datasets and databases; static copy of the living spreadsheet at https://goo.gl/QxzfHy (access date ",
        format(Sys.time(), '%Y-%m-%d'), ")"), 
      booktabs = T) %>%
kable_styling(latex_options = c("scale_down", "repeat_header"), font_size = 6) %>%
